## setUp 
### load Packages 


```{r load-packages, message = TRUE}
installed.packages("tidyverse")
installed.packages("htttr")
installed.packages("xml2")



library(tidyverse)
library(httr)
library(xml2)


```
## extract re3data ID 

```{r }
re3data_request <-GET("http://re3data.org/api/v1/repositories")
re3data_xml <- read_xml(re3data_request)
re3data_IDs <- xml_text(xml_find_all(re3data_xml, xpath ="//id"))

```
